segments.text: The contrasting calm of the garden outside fills me with a bittersweet nostalgia.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember days like this; little errands turning into spontaneous adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the scene unfolding in the kitchen is one of impending trouble, and that heavy feeling creeps in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s giggles are sweet, yet the tension of what could go wrong makes me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see their excitement but also the recklessness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a fine line between joy and danger, and they seem oblivious to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder if they’ll remember this moment as a silly misadventure or as the day they got hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
